Introduction

TaeSaJa was a South Korean boy group under Masscom. The lineup consists of Kim Hyung Jun, Park Jun Suk, Lee Dong Yun, and Kim Young Min. They debuted in 1997 with the song 'The Way'.

Although they disbanded in 2001, they reunited in 2019 and released a new song.
